item.description:
Join us for the first official S.A. Meet Up!!!

Get in on the ground level! Be able to say that YOU were with us from the BEGINNING!

Successful Anonymous is looking forward to being a reliant, consistent, useful tool for its members.

We will be meeting at 123 Main St. Watertown, MA 02472 at The Watertown Free Library in the Lucia Mastrangelo Meeting Room on the 2nd Floor on Tuesday December 8, 2009.

Meeting Schedule:
7:00pm - 7:30pm --> Networking
7:30pm - 7:45pm --> Introductions
7:45pm - 8:45pm --> Open Forum Discussion
8:45pm - 9:00pm --> Takeaways and Cool Down
item.name: Successful Anonymous: Networking & Discussions - First Meet Up
